column2: b"$PMVC $PMVC.ws added 2500 warrants at $1.08 now 12500 warrants at $1.104. This is it for awhile unless it tanks below $1 in which case I will add. may accumulate up to 30K warrants if it dips into .80's. Not sayin it will just sayin I have a lotta room to accumulate n hold long https://t.co/5VdDH1TEpi"

b"$PMVC $PMVC.ws I've been buying this last few days and have 10K warrants starter at $1.11 avg. It is currently at $1.06. This is a new SPAC of famed value investor Mario Gabelli. AT low $1's for warrants I'm buying for risk/reward. May take 6 months but I'm thinking 3X return."
